content.question:
Over a three-year period, a city’s environmental protection department measured the particulate matter (<math alttext="P M 2.5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>PM</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2.5</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>) in a ten-square-mile area around one of the city’s coal-fired power plants. The annual mean level of <math alttext="P M 2.5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>PM</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2.5</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> measured was <math alttext="20.0 micrograms per cubic meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>20.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mi>μ</mi><mtext>g</mtext></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> over the three-year study period. The National Ambient Air Quality Standard (<math alttext="N A A Q S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>NAAQS</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>) for <math alttext="P M sub 2.5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>PM</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2.5</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> is an annual mean level of <math alttext="12.0 micrograms per cubic meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mi>μ</mi><mtext>g</mtext></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>, averaged over three years. The city instructs the manager of the power plant to propose a plan to aid the city in meeting the <math alttext="N A A Q S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>NAAQS</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="P M 2.5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>PM</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2.5</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> in the area around the power plant over the next ten years.
Which of the following would be the most effective plan for the manager to propose to the city?

choices.label: Install catalytic converters at the plant.
Install vapor recovery nozzles at the plant.
Install electrostatic precipitators at the plant.
Burn lignite coal instead of bituminous coal at the plant.

content.answer: Install electrostatic precipitators at the plant.

skill.text: Skill 7.D: Use data and evidence to support a potential solution.
